buildup.text: Haptic technology uses vibrations, forces, and motions to simulate the sense of touch in digital interfaces.

discovery.text: Surgeons train on haptic simulators that replicate the resistance of tissue. Gaming controllers simulate road surfaces.

twist.text: Touch is the most neglected sense in digital design. Screens optimized for eyes ignore 40% of human perception.

punchline.text: The future of design isn't just what you see. It's what you feel.
